Functions.html#/c:@F@AFStringFromNetwork.name: AFStringFromNetworkReachabilityStatus
Functions.html#/c:@F@AFStringFromNetwork.abstract: Returns a localized string representation of an AFNetworkReachabilityStatus value.

Functions.html#/c:@F@AFPercentEscapedStr.name: AFPercentEscapedStringFromString
Functions.html#/c:@F@AFPercentEscapedStr.abstract: Returns a percent-escaped string following RFC 3986 for a query string key or value.

Functions.html#/c:@F@AFQueryStringFromPa.name: AFQueryStringFromParameters
Functions.html#/c:@F@AFQueryStringFromPa.abstract: A helper method to generate encoded url query parameters for appending to the end of a URL.

Functions.html#/c:@F@AFJSONObjectByRemov.name: AFJSONObjectByRemovingKeysWithNullValues
Functions.html#/c:@F@AFJSONObjectByRemov.abstract: Recursively removes NSNull values from a JSON object.

Protocols/AFURLResponseSerialization.htm.name: -responseObjectForResponse:data:error:
Protocols/AFURLResponseSerialization.htm.abstract: The response object decoded from the data associated with a specified response.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithFileURL:name:error:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends the HTTP header Content-Disposition: file; filename=#{generated filename}; name=#{name}" and Content-Type: #{generated mimeType}, followed by the encoded file data and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithFileURL:name:fileName:mimeType:error:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends the HTTP header Content-Disposition: file; filename=#{filename}; name=#{name}" and Content-Type: #{mimeType}, followed by the encoded file data and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithInputStream:name:fileName:length:mimeType:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends the HTTP header Content-Disposition: file; filename=#{filename}; name=#{name}" and Content-Type: #{mimeType}, followed by the data from the input stream and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithFileData:name:fileName:mimeType:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends the HTTP header Content-Disposition: file; filename=#{filename}; name=#{name}" and Content-Type: #{mimeType}, followed by the encoded file data and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithFormData:name:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends the HTTP headers Content-Disposition: form-data; name=#{name}", followed by the encoded data and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -appendPartWithHeaders:body:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Appends HTTP headers, followed by the encoded data and the multipart form boundary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.name: -throttleBandwidthWithPacketSize:delay:
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html#/c:ob.abstract: Throttles request bandwidth by limiting the packet size and adding a delay for each chunk read from the upload stream.

Protocols/AFURLRequestSerialization.html.name: -requestBySerializingRequest:withParameters:error:
Protocols/AFURLRequestSerialization.html.abstract: Returns a request with the specified parameters encoded into a copy of the original request.

Protocols/AFURLRequestSerialization.html.name: AFURLRequestSerialization
Protocols/AFURLRequestSerialization.html.abstract: The AFURLRequestSerialization protocol is adopted by an object that encodes parameters for a specified HTTP requests. Request serializers may encode parameters as query strings, HTTP bodies, setting the appropriate HTTP header fields as necessary.

Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html.name: AFMultipartFormData
Protocols/AFMultipartFormData.html.abstract: The AFMultipartFormData protocol defines the methods supported by the parameter in the block argument of AFHTTPRequestSerializer -multipartFormRequestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:constructingBodyWithBlock:.

Protocols/AFURLResponseSerialization.htm.name: AFURLResponseSerialization
Protocols/AFURLResponseSerialization.htm.abstract: The AFURLResponseSerialization protocol is adopted by an object that decodes data into a more useful object representation, according to details in the server response. Response serializers may additionally perform validation on the incoming response and data.

Constants.html#/c:@kAFUploadStream3GSugg.name: kAFUploadStream3GSuggestedPacketSize
Constants.html#/c:@kAFUploadStream3GSugg.abstract: Throttling Bandwidth for HTTP Request Input Streams

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: Posted when a task finishes executing. Includes a userInfo dictionary with additional information about the task.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidSu.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidSuspendNotification
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidSu.abstract: Posted when a task suspends its execution.

Constants.html#/c:@AFURLSessionDownloadT.name: AFURLSessionDownloadTaskDidMoveFileSuccessfullyNotification
Constants.html#/c:@AFURLSessionDownloadT.abstract: Posted when a session download task finished moving the temporary download file to a specified destination successfully.

Constants.html#/c:@AFURLSessionDownloadT.name: AFURLSessionDownloadTaskDidFailToMoveFileNotification
Constants.html#/c:@AFURLSessionDownloadT.abstract: Posted when a session download task encountered an error when moving the temporary download file to a specified destination.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteResponseDataKey
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: The raw response data of the task. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification if response data exists for the task.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteSerializedResponseKey
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: The serialized response object of the task. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification if the response was serialized.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteResponseSerializerKey
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: The response serializer used to serialize the response. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification if the task has an associated response serializer.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteAssetPathKey
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: The file path associated with the download task. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification if an the response data has been stored directly to disk.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteErrorKey
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: Any error associated with the task, or the serialization of the response. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteNotification if an error exists.

Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.name: AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteSessionTaskMetrics
Constants.html#/c:@AFNetworkingTaskDidCo.abstract: The session task metrics taken from the download task. Included in the userInfo dictionary of the AFNetworkingTaskDidCompleteSessionTaskMetrics

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: baseURL
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: The URL used to construct requests from relative paths in methods like requestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:, and the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: requestSerializer
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Requests created with requestWithMethod:URLString:parameters: & multipartFormRequestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:constructingBodyWithBlock: are constructed with a set of default headers using a parameter serialization specified by this property. By default, this is set to an instance of AFHTTPRequestSerializer, which serializes query string parameters for GET, HEAD, and DELETE requests, or otherwise URL-form-encodes HTTP message bodies.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: responseSerializer
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of AFJSONResponseSerializer.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: securityPolicy
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: The security policy used by created session to evaluate server trust for secure connections. AFURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified. A security policy configured with AFSSLPinningModePublicKey or AFSSLPinningModeCertificate can only be applied on a session manager initialized with a secure base URL (i.e. https). Applying a security policy with pinning enabled on an insecure session manager throws an Invalid Security Policy exception.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithBaseURL:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes an AFHTTPSessionManager object with the specified base URL.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithBaseURL:sessionConfiguration:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Initializes an AFHTTPSessionManager object with the specified base URL.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -GET:parameters:headers:progress:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a GET request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -HEAD:parameters:headers:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a HEAD request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -POST:parameters:headers:progress:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a POST request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -POST:parameters:headers:constructingBodyWithBlock:progress:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a multipart POST request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -PUT:parameters:headers:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a PUT request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -PATCH:parameters:headers:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a PATCH request.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.name: -DELETE:parameters:headers:success:failure:
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates and runs an NSURLSessionDataTask with a DELETE request.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: session
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The managed session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: operationQueue
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The operation queue on which delegate callbacks are run.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: responseSerializer
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Responses sent from the server in data tasks created with dataTaskWithRequest:success:failure: and run using the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods are automatically validated and serialized by the response serializer. By default, this property is set to an instance of AFJSONResponseSerializer.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: securityPolicy
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The security policy used by created session to evaluate server trust for secure connections. AFURLSessionManager uses the defaultPolicy unless otherwise specified.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: reachabilityManager
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The network reachability manager. AFURLSessionManager uses the sharedManager by default.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: tasks
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The data, upload, and download tasks currently run by the managed session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: dataTasks
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The data tasks currently run by the managed session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: uploadTasks
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The upload tasks currently run by the managed session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: downloadTasks
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The download tasks currently run by the managed session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: completionQueue
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The dispatch queue for completionBlock. If NULL (default), the main queue is used.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: completionGroup
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: The dispatch group for completionBlock. If NULL (default), a private dispatch group is used.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithSessionConfiguration:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates and returns a manager for a session created with the specified configuration. This is the designated initializer.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -invalidateSessionCancelingTasks:resetSession:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Invalidates the managed session, optionally canceling pending tasks and optionally resets given session.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -dataTaskWithRequest:uploadProgress:downloadProgress:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDataTask with the specified request.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -uploadTaskWithRequest:fromFile:progress:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified request for a local file.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -uploadTaskWithRequest:fromData:progress:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified request for an HTTP body.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -uploadTaskWithStreamedRequest:progress:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionUploadTask with the specified streaming request.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -downloadTaskWithRequest:progress:destination:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDownloadTask with the specified request.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -downloadTaskWithResumeData:progress:destination:completionHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates an NSURLSessionDownloadTask with the specified resume data.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -uploadProgressForTask:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the upload progress of the specified task.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -downloadProgressForTask:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the download progress of the specified task.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setSessionDidBecomeInvalidBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when the managed session becomes invalid, as handled by the NSURLSessionDelegate method URLSession:didBecomeInvalidWithError:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setSessionDidReceiveAuthenticationChallengeBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a connection level authentication challenge has occurred, as handled by the NSURLSessionDelegate method URLSession:didReceiveChallenge:completionHandler:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setTaskNeedNewBodyStreamBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a task requires a new request body stream to send to the remote server, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:needNewBodyStream:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setTaskWillPerformHTTPRedirectionBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when an HTTP request is attempting to perform a redirection to a different URL, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:willPerformHTTPRedirection:newRequest:completionHandler:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setAuthenticationChallengeHandler:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a session task has received a request specific authentication challenge, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didReceiveChallenge:completionHandler:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setTaskDidSendBodyDataBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed periodically to track upload progress, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didSendBodyData:totalBytesSent:totalBytesExpectedToSend:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setTaskDidCompleteBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed as the last message related to a specific task, as handled by the NSURLSessionTaskDelegate method URLSession:task:didCompleteWithError:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setTaskDidFinishCollectingMetricsBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDataTaskDidReceiveResponseBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task has received a response, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didReceiveResponse:completionHandler:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDataTaskDidBecomeDownloadTaskBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task has become a download task, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didBecomeDownloadTask:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDataTaskDidReceiveDataBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a data task receives data, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:didReceiveData:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDataTaskWillCacheResponseBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed to determine the caching behavior of a data task, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSession:dataTask:willCacheResponse:completionHandler:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDidFinishEventsForBackgroundURLSessionBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed once all messages enqueued for a session have been delivered, as handled by the NSURLSessionDataDelegate method URLSessionDidFinishEventsForBackgroundURLSession:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDownloadTaskDidFinishDownloadingBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a download task has completed a download, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didFinishDownloadingToURL:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDownloadTaskDidWriteDataBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed periodically to track download progress, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didWriteData:totalBytesWritten:totalBytesExpectedToWrite:.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.name: -setDownloadTaskDidResumeBlock:
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be executed when a download task has been resumed, as handled by the NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate method URLSession:downloadTask:didResumeAtOffset:expectedTotalBytes:.

Classes/AFCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.name: +compoundSerializerWithResponseSerializers:
Classes/AFCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.abstract: Creates and returns a compound serializer comprised of the specified response serializers.

Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: imageScale
Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: The scale factor used when interpreting the image data to construct responseImage. Specifying a scale factor of 1.0 results in an image whose size matches the pixel-based dimensions of the image. Applying a different scale factor changes the size of the image as reported by the size property. This is set to the value of scale of the main screen by default, which automatically scales images for retina displays, for instance.

Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html#/.name: automaticallyInflatesResponseImage
Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html#/.abstract: Whether to automatically inflate response image data for compressed formats (such as PNG or JPEG). Enabling this can significantly improve drawing performance on iOS when used with setCompletionBlockWithSuccess:failure:, as it allows a bitmap representation to be constructed in the background rather than on the main thread. YES by default.

Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.name: format
Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.abstract: The property list format. Possible values are described in “NSPropertyListFormat”.

Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.name: readOptions
Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.abstract: The property list reading options. Possible values are described in “NSPropertyListMutabilityOptions.”

Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.name: +serializerWithFormat:readOptions:
Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.abstract: Creates and returns a property list serializer with a specified format, read options, and write options.

Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: readingOptions
Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: Options for reading the response JSON data and creating the Foundation objects. For possible values, see the NSJSONSerialization documentation section “NSJSONReadingOptions”. 0 by default.

Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: removesKeysWithNullValues
Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: Whether to remove keys with NSNull values from response JSON. Defaults to NO.

Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: +serializerWithReadingOptions:
Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: Creates and returns a JSON serializer with specified reading and writing options.

Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: +serializer
Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: Creates and returns a serializer with default configuration.

Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: acceptableStatusCodes
Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: The acceptable HTTP status codes for responses. When non-nil, responses with status codes not contained by the set will result in an error during validation.

Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.name: acceptableContentTypes
Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html#/c.abstract: The acceptable MIME types for responses. When non-nil, responses with a Content-Type with MIME types that do not intersect with the set will result in an error during validation.

Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..name: format
Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..abstract: The property list format. Possible values are described in “NSPropertyListFormat”.

Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..name: +serializerWithFormat:writeOptions:
Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..abstract: Creates and returns a property list serializer with a specified format, read options, and write options.

Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: writingOptions
Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Options for writing the request JSON data from Foundation objects. For possible values, see the NSJSONSerialization documentation section “NSJSONWritingOptions”. 0 by default.

Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: +serializerWithWritingOptions:
Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Creates and returns a JSON serializer with specified reading and writing options.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: stringEncoding
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: The string encoding used to serialize parameters. NSUTF8StringEncoding by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: allowsCellularAccess
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Whether created requests can use the deviceâ€™s cellular radio (if present). YES by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: cachePolicy
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: The cache policy of created requests. NSURLRequestUseProtocolCachePolicy by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: HTTPShouldHandleCookies
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Whether created requests should use the default cookie handling. YES by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: HTTPShouldUsePipelining
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Whether created requests can continue transmitting data before receiving a response from an earlier transmission. NO by default

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: networkServiceType
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: The network service type for created requests. NSURLNetworkServiceTypeDefault by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: timeoutInterval
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: The timeout interval, in seconds, for created requests. The default timeout interval is 60 seconds.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: HTTPRequestHeaders
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Default HTTP header field values to be applied to serialized requests. By default, these include the following:

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: +serializer
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Creates and returns a serializer with default configuration.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -setValue:forHTTPHeaderField:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Sets the value for the HTTP headers set in request objects made by the HTTP client. If nil, removes the existing value for that header.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -valueForHTTPHeaderField:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Returns the value for the HTTP headers set in the request serializer.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -setAuthorizationHeaderFieldWithUsername:password:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Sets the “Authorization” HTTP header set in request objects made by the HTTP client to a basic authentication value with Base64-encoded username and password. This overwrites any existing value for this header.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -clearAuthorizationHeader
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Clears any existing value for the “Authorization” HTTP header.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: HTTPMethodsEncodingParametersInURI
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: HTTP methods for which serialized requests will encode parameters as a query string. GET, HEAD, and DELETE by default.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -setQueryStringSerializationWithStyle:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Set the method of query string serialization according to one of the pre-defined styles.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -setQueryStringSerializationWithBlock:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Set the a custom method of query string serialization according to the specified block.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -requestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:error:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an NSMutableURLRequest object with the specified HTTP method and URL string.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -multipartFormRequestWithMethod:URLString:parameters:constructingBodyWithBlock:error:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an NSMutableURLRequest object with the specified HTTP method and URLString, and constructs a multipart/form-data HTTP body, using the specified parameters and multipart form data block. See http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/interact/forms.html#h-17.13.4.2

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.name: -requestWithMultipartFormRequest:writingStreamContentsToFile:completionHandler:
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html#/c:.abstract: Creates an NSMutableURLRequest by removing the HTTPBodyStream from a request, and asynchronously writing its contents into the specified file, invoking the completion handler when finished.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: reachable
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Whether or not the network is currently reachable.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: reachableViaWWAN
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Whether or not the network is currently reachable via WWAN.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: reachableViaWiFi
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Whether or not the network is currently reachable via WiFi.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: +manager
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Creates and returns a network reachability manager with the default socket address.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: +managerForDomain:
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Creates and returns a network reachability manager for the specified domain.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: +managerForAddress:
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Creates and returns a network reachability manager for the socket address.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: -initWithReachability:
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Initializes an instance of a network reachability manager from the specified reachability object.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: -startMonitoring
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Starts monitoring for changes in network reachability status.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: -stopMonitoring
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Stops monitoring for changes in network reachability status.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: -localizedNetworkReachabilityStatusString
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Returns a localized string representation of the current network reachability status.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: -setReachabilityStatusChangeBlock:
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: Sets a callback to be executed when the network availability of the baseURL host changes.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: SSLPinningMode
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The criteria by which server trust should be evaluated against the pinned SSL certificates. Defaults to AFSSLPinningModeNone.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: pinnedCertificates
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The certificates used to evaluate server trust according to the SSL pinning mode.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: allowInvalidCertificates
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Whether or not to trust servers with an invalid or expired SSL certificates. Defaults to NO.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: validatesDomainName
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Whether or not to validate the domain name in the certificate’s CN field. Defaults to YES.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: +certificatesInBundle:
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Returns any certificates included in the bundle. If you are using AFNetworking as an embedded framework, you must use this method to find the certificates you have included in your app bundle, and use them when creating your security policy by calling policyWithPinningMode:withPinnedCertificates.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: +defaultPolicy
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Returns the shared default security policy, which does not allow invalid certificates, validates domain name, and does not validate against pinned certificates or public keys.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: +policyWithPinningMode:
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Creates and returns a security policy with the specified pinning mode.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: +policyWithPinningMode:withPinnedCertificates:
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Creates and returns a security policy with the specified pinning mode.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.name: -evaluateServerTrust:forDomain:
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Whether or not the specified server trust should be accepted, based on the security policy.

Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html.name: AFSecurityPolicy
Classes/AFSecurityPolicy.html.abstract: AFSecurityPolicy evaluates server trust against pinned X.509 certificates and public keys over secure connections.

Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.name: AFNetworkReachabilityManager
Classes/AFNetworkReachabilityManager.htm.abstract: AFNetworkReachabilityManager monitors the reachability of domains, and addresses for both WWAN and WiFi network interfaces.

Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html.name: AFHTTPRequestSerializer
Classes/AFHTTPRequestSerializer.html.abstract: AFHTTPRequestSerializer conforms to the AFURLRequestSerialization & AFURLResponseSerialization protocols, offering a concrete base implementation of query string / URL form-encoded parameter serialization and default request headers, as well as response status code and content type validation.

Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html.name: AFJSONRequestSerializer
Classes/AFJSONRequestSerializer.html.abstract: AFJSONRequestSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPRequestSerializer that encodes parameters as JSON using NSJSONSerialization, setting the Content-Type of the encoded request to application/json.

Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..name: AFPropertyListRequestSerializer
Classes/AFPropertyListRequestSerializer..abstract: AFPropertyListRequestSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPRequestSerializer that encodes parameters as JSON using NSPropertyListSerializer, setting the Content-Type of the encoded request to application/x-plist.

Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html.name: AFHTTPResponseSerializer
Classes/AFHTTPResponseSerializer.html.abstract: AFHTTPResponseSerializer conforms to the AFURLRequestSerialization & AFURLResponseSerialization protocols, offering a concrete base implementation of query string / URL form-encoded parameter serialization and default request headers, as well as response status code and content type validation.

Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html.name: AFJSONResponseSerializer
Classes/AFJSONResponseSerializer.html.abstract: AFJSONResponseSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPResponseSerializer that validates and decodes JSON responses.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)AFXMLParserRespo.name: AFXMLParserResponseSerializer
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)AFXMLParserRespo.abstract: AFXMLParserResponseSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPResponseSerializer that validates and decodes XML responses as an NSXMLParser objects.

Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.name: AFPropertyListResponseSerializer
Classes/AFPropertyListResponseSerializer.abstract: AFPropertyListResponseSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPResponseSerializer that validates and decodes XML responses as an NSXMLDocument objects.

Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html.name: AFImageResponseSerializer
Classes/AFImageResponseSerializer.html.abstract: AFImageResponseSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPResponseSerializer that validates and decodes image responses.

Classes/AFCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.name: AFCompoundResponseSerializer
Classes/AFCompoundResponseSerializer.htm.abstract: AFCompoundSerializer is a subclass of AFHTTPResponseSerializer that delegates the response serialization to the first AFHTTPResponseSerializer object that returns an object for responseObjectForResponse:data:error:, falling back on the default behavior of AFHTTPResponseSerializer. This is useful for supporting multiple potential types and structures of server responses with a single serializer.

Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html.name: AFURLSessionManager
Classes/AFURLSessionManager.html.abstract: AFURLSessionManager creates and manages an NSURLSession object based on a specified NSURLSessionConfiguration object, which conforms to <NSURLSessionTaskDelegate>, <NSURLSessionDataDelegate>, <NSURLSessionDownloadDelegate>, and <NSURLSessionDelegate>.

Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html.name: AFHTTPSessionManager
Classes/AFHTTPSessionManager.html.abstract: AFHTTPSessionManager is a subclass of AFURLSessionManager with convenience methods for making HTTP requests. When a baseURL is provided, requests made with the GET / POST / et al. convenience methods can be made with relative paths.
